title: in game ping problems, welp !
body: in game ping since new client beta update goes up to 1k ms every game even in custome while ping outside game always less than 100 ms nyone has an idea how to fix it ?

replies.body: Sounds like you could be having a connection problem to the game server.  Something like a router issue or local problem can be causing delays in how long it takes to reach us.  Go through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you've got any questions.
thanks for fast reply i ll try what i can and see

everything seems fine there is no package lost the only problem is in syncing system clock
:/
